synopsis.text:
Program s training superpowered heroes are on the rise in a world where 80% of the population possesses unique abilities known as "Quirks." Izuku Midoriya, a determined middle school student, finds himself among the unlucky 20% born without a Quirk. Despite this setback, Izuku's lifelong dream of becoming a hero remains unshaken.

Izuku's persistence and courage catch the eye of All Might, the world's greatest hero, who decides to bestow upon him his own transferable Quirk, One For All. With this newfound power, Izuku gains entrance to U.A. High School, an elite academy for aspiring heroes.

In this prestigious institution, Izuku faces a challenging entrance exam and encounters a diverse group of talented classmates, each with their own unique Quirks. As he navigates the trials and tribulations of hero training, Izuku must learn to master his new abilities and confront the looming threat of villains.

With the guidance of All Might and the support of his fellow students, Izuku embarks on a journey to prove that even the Quirkless can rise to become a true hero.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
